content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft polished andesite I need to craft two andesites first. To craft an andesite I need to place one diorite and one cobblestone next to each other in the crafting grid. The cobblestone is currently located in slot 26, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: The cobblestone is now in slot 1, but I also need to move a diorite to the right of it. The diorite is currently in slot 38, so I will move it to slot 2 which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that the ingredients are in the correct positions, I can craft the andesite by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft polished_andesite. Polished_andesite requires placing 4 andesites in a 2x2 square in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to craft the andesite by moving the cobblestone from slot 26 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I need to move the diorite to the right of the cobblestone in order to craft the andesite. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the diorite to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the andesite by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 2

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft 4 polished_andesite, I need to place 4 andesite blocks in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. There are 4 andesite blocks in total in the inventory, so I can move them all to the crafting grid. The first one goes to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: Next I need to place the second andesite block to the right of the first one. This corresponds to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: Next I need to place the third andesite block below the first one. This corresponds to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
thought: Finally, I need to place the last andesite block to the right of the third one. This corresponds to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 5 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "dark_oak_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 25}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 33, "index": 43}]
